title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Meet the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, the all-in-one wet-dry vacuum and mop that turns everyday messes into a quick, satisfying clean. Designed for busy homes and pet families, this powerful 36V lithium-ion cordless cleaner vacuums and washes at the same time—so you can ditch multiple tools and finish floors faster.

Why you’ll love it:
- True multi-surface mastery: Safely and effectively cleans tile, sealed wood, laminate, linoleum, pressed wood, rubber floor mats, and even area rugs.
- Cordless freedom: Up to 30 minutes of run time lets you glide room to room without plugging and unplugging.
- Edge-to-edge pickup: Improved edge cleaning tackles dust and debris that hide along baseboards and corners.
- Smarter cleaning: WiFi connectivity with the BISSELL Connect app provides helpful alerts, tips, and maintenance tracking.
- Always fresh performance: A self-cleaning cycle flushes the brush roll and internal pathways, so it’s ready for the next go.
- Rotating brush + swivel steering: A 10.5-inch cleaning path and nimble swivel head make quick work of tight spots.
- Two-Tank Technology: Clean water (28 oz) stays separate from dirty water (18.6 oz), so you always clean with fresh formula.
- Grab-and-go convenience: Lightweight with an easy carry handle for effortless maneuvering and storage.

What’s in the box:
- 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
- 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
- 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

Feel-good cleaning: Every purchase supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping save homeless pets.

From spilled cereal on the kitchen floor to muddy paw prints on the entryway rug, the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max 2554A delivers a deeper, faster clean—without the cord, the hassle, or the compromise. Clean more, charge less, and love your floors again.
